tool_description: Tool for event-based classification of biotech news.
name: News2Events
title: News2Events

api_list.name: classify
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news2events.p.rapidapi.com/classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news2events.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
